sub_title: Carbonate Geologist at Shell Global Solutions
summary:
Experienced Carbonate Geologist specialized in reservoir quality, sedimentology, sequence stratigraphy and diagenesis. Proven track record of delivering high-quality integrated reservoir evaluation and gross depositional environment (GDE) maps of complex carbonate and mixed carbonate/siliciclastic systems for exploration, appraisal and field development activities worldwide. During my career inside and outside Shell I have gained high level of competency in reservoir geology (3D static sedimentology and diagenetic modelling), with involvement in exploration, appraisal and field development activities. Experience in play generation and lead portfolio generation and maturation in Middle East carbonate systems. In addition particularly extensive exposure and experience in the Middle East (UAE, Iraq, Kuwait, Oman) as well as worldwide: Kazakhstan, Guyana, Gulf of Mexico, Nigeria, Italy, Morocco, Spain. Expert in application of various methodologies for carbonate reservoirs: core data, seismic stratigraphy, petrography, permeability prediction, rock typing, cathodoluminescence (CL), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), isotopes.
•	Development/Production: update of static modelling of Hail field (UAE), Integration and concept for static modelling of Jurassic NKGF (Kuwait), High-resolution of flow zones correlation based on pressure and production analysis for the Jurassic systems (NKJGF - Kuwait), Rock typing and diagenesis of Jurassic North Kuwait Gas Field (NKGF) for static modelling input (Kuwait), Multi-disciplinary integration of novel specialist evaluations (including sedimentology, sequence stratigraphy, diagenesis) in 4D resulted in a full field static model of the Kairan field (Kazakhstan), Static modelling of the Permian carbonate mound Kairan field (Kazakhstan) as input for dynamic modelling.
•	Exploration: Sedimentological characterisation, seismic interpretation and mapping of Cretaceous carbonate platform (Nigeria), Rejuvenation lead portfolio of UAE: seismic interpretation, mapping and leads portfolio generation and maturation, GDE maps and reservoir quality maps for Cretaceous carbonate reservoirs as input for play maps (Nigeria, UAE and Oman), Seismic interpretation and mapping of Cretaceous carbonate platform in UAE, Diagenetic analysis and reservoir quality prediction of the KP breccias Campeche Escarpment (Gulf of Mexico) as input for play maps maps for lead generation, Sedimentological and seismic facies characterisation of Cretaceous carbonate systems (Guyana).
